Widget: calendar

This widget allows to display events, with or without reccurence rules, on a calendar.

Index

Properties

Methods

This widget allows to display events, with or without reccurence rules, on a calendar.

Mixes In:
  • UserConfigurationMixin

Methods

view source

getDateCalendarView()

set date view with the actual month if undefined

view source

isReadyWidget(action)

If refreshContent and DidInsertElement are done, gotoDate is called

Parameters:
  • string action

    done method: This method will be set to ready
view source

onSourceLoad(promises, methods, category)

call all methods in parameters when promises given are done (query to the backend are finished)

Parameters:
  • promise promises

    Array of promises
  • array methods

    Array of methods
  • string category

    could be et userEvent category or a behavior (optional)
view source

refreshContent()

Set the reload to true in order to redraw events extend the native refreshContent method

view source

showUserMessage(message, level)

inform the user about the last action made

Parameters:
  • string message

    information about the action to inform
  • string level

    indicate the information level (for Bootstrap color element)
